contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Etowah, Arkansas |settlement_type = [[Town]] |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_seal = |image_map = Mississippi_County_Arkansas_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Etowah_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Location in [[Mississippi County, Arkansas|Mississippi County]] and the state of [[Arkansas]] |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Political divisions of the United States|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[List of counties in Arkansas|County]] |subdivision_name = [[United States]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Arkansas]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Mississippi County, Arkansas|Mississippi]] |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 15.3 |area_total_sq_mi = 5.9 |area_land_km2 = 15.3 |area_land_sq_mi = 5.9 |area_water_km2 = 0 |area_water_sq_mi = 0 |elevation_ft = 230 |elevation_m = 70 |population_as_of = 2000 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 366 |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = 23.9 |population_density_sq_mi = 62 |timezone = [[North American Central Time Zone|Central (CST)]] |utc_offset = -6 |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_type = region:US_type:city |latd = 35 |latm = 43 |lats = 2 |latNS = N |longd = 90 |longm = 13 |longs = 19 |longEW = W |timezone_DST = CDT |utc_offset_DST = -5 |postal_code_type = [[ZIP code]] |postal_code = 72428 |area_code = [[Area code 870|870]] |blank_name = [[Federal Information Processing Standard|FIPS code]] |blank_info = 05-22120 |blank1_name = [[Geographic Names Information System|GNIS]] feature ID |blank1_info = 0057729 |footnotes = |website = }} '''Etowah''' is a town in [[Mississippi County, Arkansas|Mississippi County]], [[Arkansas]], [[United States]]. The population was 366 at the [[2000 United States Census|2000 census]]. ==Geography== Etowah is located at {{Coord|35|43|2|N|90|13|19|W|type:city}} (35.717221, -90.221893){{GR|1}}. According to the [[United States Census Bureau]], the town has a total area of 15.3 km² (5.9 mi²), all land. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 366 people, 137 households, and 106 families residing in the town. The [[population density]] was 24.0/km² (62.1/mi²). There were 153 housing units at an average density of 10.0/km² (26.0/mi²). The racial makeup of the town was 94.81% [[Race (United States Census)|White]], 1.37% [[Race (United States Census)|Black]] or [[Race (United States Census)|African American]], 1.64% [[Race (United States Census)|Native American]], 0.55% from [[Race (United States Census)|other races]], and 1.64% from two or more races. 0.82% of the population were [[Race (United States Census)|Hispanic]] or [[Race (United States Census)|Latino]] of any race. There were 137 households out of which 36.5% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 60.6% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 11.7% had a female householder with no husband present, and 22.6% were non-families. 18.2% of all households were made up of individuals and 6.6% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.67 and the average family size was 3.07. In the town the population was spread out with 28.1% under the age of 18, 7.4% from 18 to 24, 31.1% from 25 to 44, 21.9% from 45 to 64, and 11.5% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 34 years. For every 100 females there were 94.7 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 105.5 males. The median income for a household in the town was $21,563, and the median income for a family was $23,750. Males had a median income of $19,643 versus $17,679 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the town was $8,890. About 13.3% of families and 19.1% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 20.5% of those under age 18 and 23.6% of those age 65 or over. ==References== <references /> {{Mississippi County, Arkansas}} [[Category:Towns in Arkansas]] [[Category:Populated places in Mississippi County, Arkansas]]
